chapters.title: Chapter 9:  A Short Path
chapters.info: Mylen, p. 244—One of six damane who were once in direct service to Tuon. She is very short, shorter than Tuon. She is a special source of pride, as Tuon trained her herself. She was an Aes Sedai before being captured, but has been so changed by her captivity that she would betray a liberator. See also Caminelle, Sheraine.
